thumb.title: ファイアーエムブレム蒼炎の軌跡マニアック最短攻略21章22章23章
thumb.description: ファイアーエムブレム蒼炎の軌跡マニアック最短攻略115ターンChapter 21 Expenditures: +5 might 0 crit Thunder tome (14707g). 1 Steel Axe (420g). 2 Javelins (500g each). 2 Pure Water (900g each). Muarim takes Smite. Chapter 21 Bexp used: None. Chapter 22 Expenditures: +5 might +9 crit Javelin (12927g). Arms Scroll to Soren. Chapter 22 Bexp used: Mist to level 19 (1097p to 1088p). Soren to level 6 (1088p to 1064p). Chapter 23 Expenditures: +1 might 0 crit Slim Sword (4529g). Chapter 23 Bexp used: Mist to level 1 promoted (1454p to 1173p). Ike to level 5 (1173p to 1140p). Tanith to level 12 (1140p to 1131p).
